GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v5.10.138
GSD.description:
iavf: Fix adminq error handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.138 by commit 4fe80492d53971d9a49f39f3c86d2d67c6f3638a, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit d358aa9a7a2d5f91b1d33d5d4e27c2e46638d123. For more details please see the references link.
